ygData.subject: RE: New Bard Quests! (long spoilerish)
ygData.msgSnippet: Doh!  I said it was too early in the morning earlier didn t I?  Obviously it was true.  That s what happens when you try to squeeze a hockey game and EQ into
ygData.messageBody:
Doh! I said it was too early in the morning earlier didn't I? Obviously it
was true. That's what happens when you try to squeeze a hockey game and EQ
into one worknight.
<slinks away dejectedly, dreaming of that far of day when a hill giant won't
squish him like a bug>

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:slasher@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 07, 1999 12:40 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Bard Quests! (long spoilerish)


From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>

>Where the heck do you get the Lambent stone you
>have to turn in with the two gemstones?

Harmonic hands Kitasi some reading glasses:

You say, 'What are lambent stones?'

Walthin Fireweaver says 'Lambent Stones are gemstones of great power.
They are midnight blue in color, and can be found on Hill Giants,
Sand Giants and Griffons.'

Harmonic Distortion, 38th unchained melody.
League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
